hero.title: Hello, I'm William Ferreira da Silva
hero.description: I'm a Full-stack Developer with solid experience in Delphi, Node.js, NestJS, Java Android, React, Next.js and Java. Currently, my focus is on full-stack development, microservices, Clean Code practices and AWS solutions, as well as actively contributing to Open Source projects. I'm always looking for new challenges and open to participating in initiatives that make a real impact.

footer.rights: © {year} William F. da Silva. All rights reserved.

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: Hi! I’m William Ferreira da Silva, a Full-Stack Developer with experience in Delphi, Node.js, NestJS, Java Android, React, Next.js and Java.
about.paragraph2: Over my career, I’ve built systems ranging from legacy Delphi software to modern microservices-based applications. I’m passionate about Clean Code, architecture best practices, and scalable AWS solutions.
about.paragraph3: I also contribute to Open Source projects and am always seeking new challenges that help me grow as a developer.
